Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              SELLING ACTIVITIES:
              
              - Conduct selling activities within assigned vacant territory to meet given volume targets, maximize distribution & availability, minimize out-of-stocks
              
              - Ensure that selling activities are only conducted in authorized and/or assigned Point Of Sales
              
              - Ensure full compliance to pricing and sales processes for every transaction
              
              - Measure on total territory volume targets (approximately 8 sales routes per territory)
              
              - Monitor progress of volume target achievement for total territory
              

              ROUTE PLANNING & COMPLIANCE:
              
              - Assist the supervisor in the route planning of MDSs within the territory
              
              - Monitor & Analyse the efficiencies of current routes and propose improvements
              
              - Ensure route compliance through audits as instructed by supervisor
              

              DIRECT PEOPLE MANAGEMENT:
              
              - Act as a trainer for newly appointed MDS
              
              - Conduct Work-With/Work Review sessions with MDS as assigned by supervisor
              
              - Provide on-the-job coaching to team members to develop selling and planing skills
